Ok I uploaded a few new files in different methods/experiments in my files sub folders. Heres the link for those who are curious. You guys should use the subfolders so all your files are in one folder and easier to locate.
   
  http://tech.groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Misty%20Dawns/
   
  or you can click on files if you are on the group site. Theres quite a few different things I have tried but I may post those to my esnips eventually for you all.
   
  Misty
